basic_information.scholarship_name: Native American Faculty & Staff Association Scholarship

description: To provide scholarships for UCO Students who meet the following criteria: Eligibility Requirements Enrolled full-time (12 hours for undergraduate / 6 hours for graduate) 2.50 GPA (undergraduate) / 3.0 GPA (graduate) Must be an officer or member of the Native American Student Association and demonstrate exemplary service to the organization Must submit a personal statement describing involvement and accomplishments made while a member of the Native American Student Association This scholarship is available to apply for during the Current UCO Student Application.

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
